topics.body:
"@AppleJackFrost":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556083bf63687279aa270900#post_556083bf63687279aa270900
Kotaku went to shit when they were bought out.

"Their parent company, gawker, are such assholes that they're suing the fbi to try to get a copy of hulk hogan's sex tape.":http://www.courthousenews.com/2015/05/22/gawker-sues-fbi-over-hulk-hogan-sex-tape.htm

I hope they get sued to death cause suing the fbi saying you have the right to invade someone's privacy and steal their private videos taken in their house is a massive invasion of privacy.  Tabloids need to be shown that they don't have the right to steal people's personal private videos and distribute them without their consent.  Gawker is getting sued for $100,000,000 and probably will lose the court case; they might go out of business cause they're only worth $300,000,000 and have a operational budget of 30 million a year.

topics.body:
"@AppleJackFrost":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55608b236368727464c40200#post_55608b236368727464c40200
You can use the "score:>#" function to search by how many upvotes it has; ie "score:>100" will only give images that have received 101 or more upvotes.
"rating:<insert>" will only give you specific ratings; ie "rating:safe" will only give you images that are sfw.
The " - " is used before keywords you want to exclude; ie " -ocean" will exclude any images with the ocean in it.
